## StartServicesAccessor type

Allows plugins to get access to APIs available in start inside async handlers, such as [App.mount](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.app.mount.md)<!-- -->. Promise will not resolve until Core and plugin dependencies have completed `start`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StartServicesAccessor<TPluginsStart extends object = object, TStart = unknown> = () => Promise<[CoreStart, TPluginsStart, TStart]>;
```
